TITLE Hoagie Salad

# Stir everything in a large bowl.
# Cook [1 lbs garlic sausage]. Cool to handle and slice on a diagonal.
# Dice [1/2 head Celery]. 
# Cube [3/4 lbs Provolone].
# Slice [1.5 cup roasted red pepper].
# Slice [1 cup kalamata olives] 
# Mince [1 item shallot]
# Chop [1 tsp thyme]
# Add [1/4 cup red wine vinegar] & [1/4 cup olive oil].
# Season with [salt] and [pepper].
